meanings.definition: The universe seen as a well-ordered whole.
meanings.sent1: Looking up at the night sky, I felt like a tiny speck in the vast cosmo.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the cosmo to understand the mysteries of space and time.
meanings.sent3: The cosmo seemed to wink at me as I pondered the meaning of life.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a swirling cosmo of thoughts and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the cosmo filled me with awe and wonder.

meanings.definition: A cocktail made with vodka, cranberry juice, and lime juice.
meanings.sent1: At the party, I ordered a refreshing cosmo to enjoy with my friends.
meanings.sent2: The bartender expertly mixed the ingredients to create the perfect cosmo.
meanings.sent3: Sipping on the cosmo, I felt like a movie star at a glamorous event.
meanings.sent4: The vibrant red color of the cosmo matched the sunset outside.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the cosmo danced on my taste buds, leaving a tangy sensation.
